name: Klika Tech, Inc
description:
We are a boutique IoT Product Development firm fueled by a team of business-driven technology professionals delivering exceptional value for our customers and partners. We help organizations to overcome challenges when it comes to building innovative IoT, Big Data and Visualization products, and innovating after launch. Our proven track record speaks for itself, and with HQ in US and offices in Germany, Canada, and Central Europe we can launch projects in a matter of weeks.
 
We develop IoT (consumer IoT to industrial IoT), Big Data and Data Visualization products from sensor-to-the-cloud to large scale data collection, data management, and analytics (real-time and historical) platforms. We have successfully productized a number of complex implementations for Wearables, Asset Tracking, Smart Home & City, Automotive / EV Charging, Healthcare, and Retail industries.
We are proud Development and Innovation Partner of Amazon AWS, Alibaba Cloud, and GE Predix. We always think outside of the spec and with 45+ years of collective management and delivery experience we know a thing or two...
Having successfully taken products from embedded programming to edge and cloud environments, through all phases of product engineering and development, we possess broad development and delivery experience. Our focus is on highest ROI for your business and we only engage professionals with skills that match your needs. We preach and practice Transparency, Communication, Collaboration and Flexibility as key aspects of any successful project.
READ MORE...
